Managing Users.
Users are end user identities that have authenticated with one of the allowed sign on methods.
Each user receives an EVM (Ethereum) compatible "L2" cryptographic identity or wallet by default and additional wallets/IDs can be linked if required.

```
  tokenName: string, 
  balance: number, 
  total: number, 
  imagePreview: string, 
  constractTokenIds: [number], 
  nftId: string,

  nftMetaUrl: string,
  nftOriginalname: string,
  nftMimetype: string,
  createdAt: string,
  updatedAt: string,
  contractAddress: string,
},
axios.response.data = {
  balances: [CoinBalance | NFTBalance],
  documents: [],
  firstName: string,
  lastName: string,
  description: string,
  profileImage: string,
}
```
